transform_def.name: bestBrot
transform_def.string: let bailout = 1/length(p_in) cz = vec4(p_in.x * size, p_in.y * size, p_in.x, p_in.y) m0 = mbit(cz, 0) m = iterate(mbit, cz) z = complex(m.z, m.w) con1 = length(z) < bailout con2 = length(z) > bailout in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
